text: Jacques N'Guea Énongué (8 November 1955 – 31 May 2022) was a Cameroonian footballer. He played as a forward. He played for the Cameroon national team between 1977 and 1984. He took part in Cameroon's first FIFA World Cup in 1982. He also played for Ouragan de Loum and Canon Yaoundé. N'Guea died in Yaoundé, Cameroon on 31 May 2022, aged 66, after a long-illness. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cameroonian footballers
title: Jacques N'Guea
